step.how_to: How to enable the canonical redirect
step.check_config_url: Check that the url defined in config.php is your preferred canonical URL (currently: {url})
step.admin_on_canonical: Access the admin panel via the canonical URL
step.enable_temporary: Enable temporary redirect and check everything works
step.suggestions: Other suggestions that this extension does not enforce or cover
step.use_hsts: Use HSTS to prevent downgrade attacks

field.wrong_url: The extension settings will appear once you access your forum via the canonical URL
